p: Pneumonia was diagnosed by pediatricians based on both physical examinations and radiologic assessments. MP pneumonia was defined as meeting at least one of the following criteria: (1) positive results in both RT-PCR analysis of nasopharyngeal samples and the specific IgM against MP at the time of hospitalization due to CAP, (2) seroconversion of the specific IgM against MP, or (3) four-fold or greater increase in the specific IgG against MP in the acute and convalescent stages [ 8, 12].
